EmailTemplate.description: Sent to submitter when a grant annual monitor form is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Grant Annual Block Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual monitoring form submitted for Grant {!Form_LCF_Grant_Annual_Block_1__c.lcf_grant__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Form_LCF_Grant_Annual_Block_1__c.OwnerFullName},
You have successfully submitted a grant annual monitoring form, reference {!Form_LCF_Grant_Annual_Block_1__c.lcf_grant__c}:{!Form_LCF_Grant_Annual_Block_1__c.Name}.
Your funding office will be in touch to review the form with you.
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the above reference
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
